attributes.action: Analyse all official claims made in the UK Remain/Leave Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Claims and counterclaims by both campaigning sides and of the EU referendum (and the media) appear to have been misleading, sometimes deliberately. The public have the right to know if they were undermined by any individuals/organisations and which individuals/organisations undermined them and how they perpetrated the act.
attributes.background: Setup an enquiry to analyse all claims and counter claims regarding all aspects of the EU referendum made by the official campaign groups and media - checking for lies and untrue/misleading statements. Publish the enquiry findings and the actions to be taken against individuals and organisation.
